rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Upon entering the living room you notice all the encrusted into the ripped old furniture. The floorboards creak with every step.  A sense of decay fills the room.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: You have entered the kitchen. A pile of stagnant and molding dishes fills the sink. A carving knife covered in fresh blood and gore sits on the counter next to a pile of severed organs.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Books are in unkempt piles all over the room. Dust floats intermingled with the smell of old books. The skeleton of a long-dead avid reader is seated in the corner, still rocking slowly, clutching it’s favorite book in it’s dead hands, its mouth slightly agape in an eerie smile.
